recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: In a bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a separate bowl, cream butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 9–11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on wire racks before serving.

recipes.name: Oatmeal Cookies
directions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
In another bowl, cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla and mix well.
Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients.
Stir in rolled oats until evenly distributed.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto baking sheets.
Bake for 10–12 minutes until lightly golden.
